html:
July 1 (Reuters) - British industrial software firm Aveva's AVV.L revenue jumped 10% in April-May, it said on Thursday, while also forecasting revenue gains of at least $100 million by 2026 from its recently completed $5 billion purchase of OSIsoft.


(Reporting by Sachin Ravikumar in Bengaluru; Editing by Saumyadeb Chakrabarty)

(( saisachin.r@tr.com ; +91 80 6182 2754; Twitter: https://twitter.com/sachinr27; ))
